attributes.action: xxx domain now approved. free firewall needed to block porn websites
attributes.additional_details: Since the approval of the xxx domain name by ICANN and ICN, all adult material websites need to register and change to this domain. A free firewall system is needed for home users, so that they can block websites. Any website caught with adult material and not having a xxx domain , needs to be blocked or reminded to change. A free firewall or if all commercial software products, like apple , microsoft , Zonealarm, Symantec eetc, can provide a free firewall to home users so that they can put a block on xxx domains.
